TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ToolStripButton extends System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem

summary.span: 表示包含文本和图像的可选的 。

span.span: Represents a selectable that can contain text and images.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用创建支持文本和图像的工具栏按钮。Use to create a toolbar button that supports both text and images. 使用和属性，以获取或设置的定位图像和文本。Use the and properties to get or set the positioning of images and text. 可以显示具有各种边框样式，并且你可以使用它来表示和激活的操作状态。You can display a with various border styles, and you can use it to represent and activate operational states. 你还可以定义其默认情况下具有焦点。You can also define it to have the focus by default. 尽管替换并扩展的早期版本中，控件以备向后兼容性和将来使用保留。Although replaces and extends the control of previous versions, is retained for both backward compatibility and future use. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示了两个上的控件使用图像和文本。The following code example shows two controls with both image and text on a . 单击**新建**显示一个消息框。Clicking the **New** displays a message box. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton/cs/Form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton/vb/Form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数创建具有指定名称，以显示图像和文本及引发单击时的事件。Use this constructor to create a with the specified name that displays both an image and text and raises the event when clicked.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置属性`true`并使用中的属性更改按钮文本的字体为加粗时单击该按钮的事件。The following code example sets the property to `true` and uses the property in a event to change the font of the button text to bold when the button is clicked. One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置到`Indeterminate`不要设置的默认状态。Set the to `Indeterminate` when you do not want to set a default state.

exception.span: 分配的值不是 值之一。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换与或追加到一个多行消息。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`ToolStripButton1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `ToolStripButton1`. 然后，确保与事件处理程序事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#568](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#568)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#568](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#568)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果不显式调用，它时将会调用引用属性。If you do not explicitly call , it will be called when the property is referenced. > [!NOTE] > 要获取或设置属性，必须添加对引用`Accessibility`随.NET Framework 一起安装的程序集。To get or set the property, you must add a reference to the `Accessibility` assembly installed with the .NET Framework.

span.span: An that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.
